version_description: Update to iOS 13 and bug fix.

• New delete multiple rows feature
• Haptic feedback support
• Fixed support of Pinyin keyboard.
• More bug fix.

• New SQL completion assistant.
• Organize queries by hashtag (with a #tag in query's comment).
• New named parameters in SQL query and autosave of params value.
• Availability of DBSTAT table.
• Add JSON1 and Geoply extensions.
• New math and string extension functions.
• More bug fix.

• Siri-Shortcuts actions
• Open encrypted database
• Export grid data to SQLite db
• Grid formatted data customizable
• SQL query result side by side (iPad only)
• New SQL functions
